Name: [color=red]M.O.M.
Text: [color=black]What gave it away, the lights working?

Name: [color=red]M.O.M.
Text: [color=black]Great work, genius.  Let's go check on the rest of the ship.

Name: [color=red]M.O.M.
Text: [color=black]We should head for the lab next--I think I can hear Professor Sove whining about his experiments from here.
